description: Learning Lots with Brie Larson & Jessie Ennis is a podcast aimed at holding stimulating conversations around pop-culture, trending topics, and some of life's deepest questions. Each episode takes listeners through various segments and will feature celebrities, friends, and experts you know and love.

items.author: learninglotspodcast@gmail.com (Brie Larson & Jessie Ennis)
items.content:
re·flec·tion / noun / consideration of some subject matter, idea, or purpose.

Brie and Jessie reflect on everything they've learned as the first season of Learning Lots draws to a close.

Who do you want to hear from in the second season? What topics do you want to learn lots about? Follow us on social media or write us a review and let us know.

Follow Learning Lots on Instagram, Twitter, & Linktree
Follow Brie Larson on Instagram & Twitter
Follow Jessie Ennis on Instagram

items.author: learninglotspodcast@gmail.com (Brie Larson & Jessie Ennis)
items.content:
flow / noun / the action or fact of moving along in a steady, continuous stream.

2 x Olympic medalist Laurie Hernandez talks with Brie and Jessie about flow state and how it affects her performance during high-states events. Later on we experience good flow in practice as we premiere a poem by Prince Ea, written for Learning Lots!

items.content:
pur·pose / noun / the reason for which something is done or created or for which something exists.

Writer, actor, model and poet Yrsa Daley-Ward talks with Brie and Jessie about purpose and how to find it within yourself. Later on, we check in with you, our listeners, to hear what helps you tune out the noise.

items.content:
lis·ten / verb / give one's attention to a sound.

Author, television host and former CIA officer Amaryllis Fox talks with Brie and Jessie about listening, and the importance of listening to our enemies. They're also joined by Instagram-birder Joshua Bellamy who discusses birdwatching and what separates one birdsong from another.

can·na·bis / noun / a tall plant with a stiff upright stem, divided serrated leaves, and glandular hairs. It is used to produce hemp fibre and as a drug.

re·gret / verb / feel sad, repentant, or disappointed over (something that one has done or failed to do).

items.content:
press·sure / noun / the use of persuasion, influence, or intimidation to make someone do something.

Seattle Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson discusses pressure and how to handle it with Brie and Jessie. They’re also joined by sport and performance psychologist Dr. Michael Gervais.

puz·zle / noun / a game, toy, or problem designed to test ingenuity or knowledge.

Magician, wordsmith and puzzle creator David Kwong talks with Brie and Jessie about puzzles, crosswords and magic, and puts them to the test with an original Learning Lots puzzle!

act·ing / noun / the art or occupation of performing in plays, movies, or television productions.

Jacob Tremblay [Luca, Wonder, Room] discusses acting with Brie and Jessie, and goes down memory lane from co-starring Brie in Room. Later in the episode Brie and Jessie go full method and perform Shakespeare monologues.

items.author: learninglotspodcast@gmail.com (Brie Larson & Jessie Ennis)
items.content:
sleep / noun / a condition of body and mind that typically recurs for several hours every night, in which the nervous system is relatively inactive, the eyes closed, the postural muscles relaxed, and consciousness practically suspended.

Comedian Mike Birbiglia [Sleepwalk with Me, Don’t Think Twice] talks with Brie and Jessie about sleep and his personal experience with REM sleep behaviour disorder. Later in the episode Director of Meditation at Headspace, Eve Lewis Prieto, takes us through a guided sleep meditation from Netflix's Headspace Guide to Sleep.

Follow Learning Lots on Instagram, Twitter, & Linktree
Follow Brie Larson on Instagram & Twitter
Follow Jessie Ennis on Instagram
Follow Mike Birbiglia on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter & Linktree
Follow Eve Lewis Prieto on Instagram & Twitter

cli·mate jus·tice / noun / a term used to frame climate change as an ethical and political issue, rather than one that is purely environmental or physical in nature.

Political activist, environmentalist and double academy award winner Jane Fonda teams up with Hop Hopkins of Sierra Club to discuss climate crises, climate justice and activism with Brie and Jessie.

con·fi·dence / noun / the feeling or belief that one can rely on someone or something; firm trust. 

Amy Poehler [Saturday Night Live, Parks and Recreation] sits down with Brie and Jessie to discuss confidence. Later in the episode Jessie asks three kids, Oona, Calvin and Story, how they feel about this week’s topic.

items.content:
anx·i·e·ty / noun / a feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease, typically about an imminent event or something with an uncertain outcome.

Bill Hader [Saturday Night Live, Barry] talks with Brie and Jessie about anxiety and how it has affected his career. They're also joined by Dr. Nina Vasan of Stanford University for a look at the medical and scientific side of anxiety.

Follow Learning Lots on Instagram, Twitter, & Linktree

itunes.author: Jessie Ennis, Brie Larson, Mariah Smith, Courtney McBroom
itunes.keywords: kardashians, ice cream, tv, reality tv, milk bar, courtney mcbroom, mariah smith, pleasures, brie larson, food, fast food, tacos, guilty, pop songs, popular, jessie ennis, lyrics, television
itunes.subtitle: Join Brie and Jessie in Episode 4 of their podcast “Learning Lots” as they sit down with TV comedy writer, pop culture devotee, and master decoder of all things Kardashians, Mariah Smith, as well as the trailblazer chef and cookbook author who helped conjure Milk Bar’s unconventional desserts, Courtney McBroom to talk guilty pleasures. We all got them, why not flaunt them? Get ready to dive in and find out which two are at the top!
itunes.summary: Join Brie and Jessie in Episode 4 of their podcast “Learning Lots” as they sit down with TV comedy writer, pop culture devotee, and master decoder of all things Kardashians, Mariah Smith, as well as the trailblazer chef and cookbook author who helped conjure Milk Bar’s unconventional desserts, Courtney McBroom to talk guilty pleasures. We all got them, why not flaunt them? Get ready to dive in and find out which two are at the top!

items.title: Mariah Smith on Guilty Pleasures + Courtney McBroom

itunes.keywords: love, success, lows, life, break ups, failure, brie larson, social, best friend, highs, difficult, good news, friendship, jessie ennis, grief, good friend
itunes.subtitle: Join Brie and Jessie in Episode 3 of their podcast “Learning Lots” as they sit down with the author of the book Hot Young Widows Club and grief expert, Nora McInerny, as well as sisters, best friends, and visionary designers behind Rodarte, Kate and Laura Mulleavy! Get ready to dive into how they support their friends through grief and achievements.
itunes.summary: Join Brie and Jessie in Episode 3 of their podcast “Learning Lots” as they sit down with the author of the book Hot Young Widows Club and grief expert, Nora McInerny, as well as sisters, best friends, and visionary designers behind Rodarte, Kate and Laura Mulleavy! Get ready to dive into how they support their friends through grief and achievements.

items.title: Nora McInerny on Friendship + Kate & Laura Mulleavy

itunes.subtitle: Join Brie and Jessie in the second episode of their podcast “Learning Lots” as they sit down with New York Times best-selling author, Glennon Doyle, and Mathematical Physicist, Spiros Michalakis, to relearn what truth really means. What truth do you hold?

itunes.keywords: poetry, comfort zones, learninglots, comfort, mountain, education, brie larson, best friends, jessie ennis, learning lots, climbing
itunes.subtitle: Join Brie and Jessie in the first episode of their podcast “Learning Lots” as they sit down with NYT best-selling author, Rupi Kaur, and climber and Oscar Award winner, Jimmy Chin, to uncover how pushing our instinctive boundaries can lead to great successes. What comfort zones do you hold?

What comfort zones do you hold?

itunes.author: Jessie Ennis, Jimmy Chin, Spiros Michalakis, Glennen Doyle, Brie Larson, Rupi Kaur
itunes.keywords: learninglots, captain marvel, trailer, brie larson, jessie ennis, learning lots
itunes.subtitle: Welcome to the all-new Learning Lots podcast, hosted by real-life friends and life-long learners Brie Larson and Jessie Ennis. This podcast will hold space for conversations and perspectives around education and pop-culture, among many things. Join Brie and Jessie on episode 1, airing March 11, 2021, as they are joined by special guests Rupi Kaur and Jimmy Chin.
itunes.summary: Welcome to the all-new Learning Lots podcast, hosted by real-life friends and life-long learners Brie Larson and Jessie Ennis. This podcast will hold space for conversations and perspectives around education and pop-culture, among many things. Join Brie and Jessie on episode 1, airing March 11, 2021, as they are joined by special guests Rupi Kaur and Jimmy Chin.

items.title: Learning Lots l Podcast Series Trailer

itunes.author: Brie Larson, Jessie Ennis
itunes.summary: Learning Lots with Brie Larson & Jessie Ennis is a podcast aimed at holding stimulating conversations around pop-culture, trending topics, and some of life's deepest questions. Each episode takes listeners through various segments and will feature celebrities, friends, and experts you know and love.

title: Learning Lots
